section.title: OpenStack Compute (Compute Node services)
section.para:
Just like with the Cloud Controller, the OpenStack Compute service is installed on the Compute Node. However, this time the nova-compute service is installed. This provides the Compute Node the capability to host virtual machines.
Install the Nova Compute package: # apt-get install nova-compute-kvm # yum install openstack-nova-compute # zypper install openstack-nova-compute
If you are doing this in a virtual environment, install the nova-compute-qemu package instead. nova-compute-kvm requires that your server have native HVM support. Most virtual environments do not support this but you can still use the nova-compute-qemu service which provides software-based virtualization.
